Service Details: - Provides employment and training services to WFN Members- Helps WFN Members gain employment with priority given to those on WFN Social Assistance and enrolled in the Active Measures Program- Includes assistance with job search, developing resumes and cover letters, assistance with employment applications, essential skills development, life skills development, connecting Members with employers, mock interviews, and employment aptitude testing- The Employment Coordinator maintains a list of WFN-owned contractors and sub-contractors, hosts the annual WFN Career Fair, and creates job opportunities by developing and maintaining partnerships/relationships with local businesses and developers
How to Apply: For more information, or to set up an appointment, please contact the Member Employment Coordinator at the WFN Health & Wellness Building
Address & Map: WFN Health and Wellness Building1900 Quail LaneWestbank, BC     V4T 2H3
